charts.title: Revenue Trend
charts.notes: Tracks total revenue growth across the projection horizon as inventory intake and leasing utilization scale. Use this to validate top-line ramp assumptions and compare against scenario targets.

charts.title: Gross Margin Profile
charts.notes: Shows gross margin expansion as service attach rate increases and parts revenue grows. This line should trend upward as higher-margin services scale.

charts.title: Unit Volume
charts.notes: Visualizes total unit volume by year to confirm fleet intake assumptions and validate that volume growth matches revenue expansion.
